name: Puzzle Hero
summary: As a stealth hero, you must free your brother from Zalock and his evil Army of Vegetables, ahem, Darkness! Duel with green beans monsters, pumpkins and up to 50 garden variety species. Collect enough gold and use it to shop for magical amulets, weaponry, and clothing accessories in the Salon. Do you have the cerebral skills to be a Puzzle Hero and outwit this Match 3 war board?
